question: What is a primary benefit of using Google Cloud?

options.a: You must purchase and maintain your own servers
options.b: It automatically scales resources to meet demand
options.c: You must install all software manually
options.d: It runs only on private local networks

question: Which term describes the delivery of computing services over the internet?
Which type of cloud service provides the highest level of abstraction from infrastructure management?
In Google Cloud, what is the fundamental organizing entity for resources?
Which Google Cloud service controls who can do what with resources?
Which type of Google Cloud account is intended for human users?
What is a service account typically used for in Google Cloud?
Which IAM concept defines a collection of permissions?
Which Google Cloud command-line tool can be used to manage resources?
Which Google Cloud interface allows managing resources via a web browser?
Which statement is true about projects in Google Cloud?

options.b: Projects are optional for resource organization
options.c: Projects cannot be linked to billing accounts

question: What does IaaS typically provide?

options.b: Full control over virtual machines and storage

question: Which term describes a group of Google Cloud resources located in a specific geographical location?
Which Google Cloud product is an IaaS offering?
What is a zone in Google Cloud?

options.b: A specific data center location within a region

question: Which network type in Google Cloud is global and automatically spans regions?
Which virtual machine option lets you pay only while the VM is running?
Which statement best describes a preemptible VM?

options.a: Low-cost VM that can be terminated at any time

question: Which command starts the interactive shell environment in the browser for Google Cloud?
Which feature of IAM allows granting the same permissions to multiple users at once?
Which Google Cloud service helps you connect on-premises networks to Google Cloud VPC?
What does the Google Cloud global network use to connect data centers?
Which Google Cloud network mode allows you to manually define subnets in specific regions?
Which Google Cloud compute service offers fully managed serverless execution?
What is the main benefit of zones within regions?

options.b: Provide high availability by distributing resources

question: Which IAM role type contains Google-managed permissions for common tasks?
Which basic IAM role grants full control over all resources in a project?
Which tool provides a browser-based command-line interface for Google Cloud?
Which networking feature in Google Cloud allows resources to communicate privately without public IPs?
What is the main difference between IaaS and PaaS in Google Cloud?

options.a: IaaS manages the operating system for you, PaaS does not
options.b: PaaS abstracts infrastructure management, IaaS provides more control over it
options.c: IaaS is cheaper in all cases than PaaS
